name: Somanshu Agarwal
title: Agile Product Owner, Cloud Integrations & Q2C Platforms
bio: Agile Product Owner with ~9 years of experience across enterprise platforms. I connect technology and business with clarity and empathy. I enjoy simplifying complex integrations making CRM, Billing, and ERP systems work together through Azure Middleware. CSPO & CSM certified, experienced with distributed teams across Europe, the US, and APAC.
